posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott M.
Drum backs in T205 are just as tough to obtain, if not tougher, than their T206 counterparts.

ON HOLD.

While the technical grade of SGC 10 is deserved because of the border chipping on the front, the image on the front and the back are both fairly clean and present nicely.

Email me at phlflyer1@comcast.net if interested in the card.

[IMG]http://home.comcast.net/~croftscocoa/misc/T205_Drum_Chase_Front.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://home.comcast.net/~croftscocoa/misc/T205_Drum_Chase_Back.jpg[/IMG]
